custom-action.name: dynatraceevents
custom-action.description:
Links a load testing event to all services used by an application monitored by Dynatrace.
Possible parameters are: - dynatraceId (required): Dynatrace ID (section of your Dynatrace saas url). Default value is "Dynatrace ID". - dynatraceApiKey (required): Dynatrace API key. Default value is "Dynatrace API key". - tags (optional): Dynatrace tags. Links the NeoLoad computed data to Dynatrace tags (format: "tag1,tag2"). Default value is "tag1,tag2". - proxyName (optional): The NeoLoad proxy name to access Dynatrace. - dynatraceManagedHostname (optional): Hostname of your managed Dynatrace environment.
